Original: Ah, so you are taking this request...
The client is that injured explorer
over there.
[Page]
It seems that he faced a powerful
monster in the Windy Plains. It slew
his comrades, and he seeks revenge.
[Page]
He can provide more details than I.
It is a dangerous request... Be very
careful. I await your swift return.
Translation: Ah, so you are taking this request...
The client is that injured explorer
over there.
[Page]
It seems that he faced a powerful
monster in the Windy Plains. It slew
his comrades, and he seeks revenge.
[Page]
He can provide more details than I.
It is a dangerous request... Be very
careful. I await your swift return.

Original: Welcome back, [Guild] Guild. I see
you have slain the monster, as always.
Well done.
[Page]
That will not bring the client's
friends back, of course. But it may
give him some needed closure.
[Page]
Thank you, [Guild] Guild. And here
is the reward you have earned.
Translation: Welcome back, [Guild] Guild. I see
you have slain the monster, as always.
Well done.
[Page]
That will not bring the client's
friends back, of course. But it may
give him some needed closure.
[Page]
Thank you, [Guild] Guild. And here
is the reward you have earned.

Original: When you land, a faint smell of blood
and a murderous presence hang in the
air... Your whole party tenses.
[Page]
The pieces of armor and weapons
scattered about indicate that a
desperate battle took place here.
Translation: When you land, a faint smell of blood
and a murderous presence hang in the
air... Your whole party tenses.
[Page]
The pieces of armor and weapons
scattered about indicate that a
desperate battle took place here.

Original: Could this be where the client's foe
lurks? But no matter how you search,
the dread monster does not emerge...
[Page]
You decide to leave on your skyship in
order to regroup and figure out a
way to draw out this monster.
Translation: Could this be where the client's foe
lurks? But no matter how you search,
the dread monster does not emerge...
[Page]
You decide to leave on your skyship in
order to regroup and figure out a
way to draw out this monster.

Original: Just when you realize the shaking of
the foliage is not the breeze, a giant
reptile sheds its camouflage!
[Page]
This must be the monster you have been
charged with slaying! You take stock,
ensuring that you are prepared...
Translation: Just when you realize the shaking of
the foliage is not the breeze, a giant
reptile sheds its camouflage!
[Page]
This must be the monster you have been
charged with slaying! You take stock,
ensuring that you are prepared...

Original: [Color:5]Are you ready for battle?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Are you ready for battle?[Color:0]

Original: Feeling unready to challenge the
dread monster, you retreat in order
to prepare for the battle!
Translation: Feeling unready to challenge the
dread monster, you retreat in order
to prepare for the battle!

Original: Though the beast's attacks stymie you,
your final strike finishes it off!
You have avenged the fallen warriors!
[Page]
You have a moment of silence for the
lost explorers' souls before boarding
your skyship for Tharsis.
Translation: Though the beast's attacks stymie you,
your final strike finishes it off!
You have avenged the fallen warriors!
[Page]
You have a moment of silence for the
lost explorers' souls before boarding
your skyship for Tharsis.

Original: You detect no threats in the region
any longer... All that's left is to
make your report at the bar.
Translation: You detect no threats in the region
any longer... All that's left is to
make your report at the bar.
